## Antibiotic-mediated mortality reductions {.smaller}

| Disease                      | Pre-antibiotic | Antibiotic | Change |
|------------------------------|----------------|------------|--------|
| Community-acquired pneumonia | \~35%          | \~10%      | -25%   |
| Nosocomial pneumonia         | \~60%          | \~30%      | -30%   |
| Bacterial endocarditis       | \~100%         | \~25%      | -75%   |
| Gram-negative bacteremia     | \~70%          | \~10%      | -10%   |
| Bacterial meningitis         | \>80%          | \< 20%     | -60%   |
| Skin infection               | \~11%          | \<0.5%     | -10%   |
